## Importing data directly from Web

```{r}
library(readxl)

url <- "https://www.eia.gov/totalenergy/data/browser/xls.php?tbl=T10.01&freq=m"

#Creating a temporary file to be imported to R
tmp <- tempfile(fileext = ".xlsx")

#downloading data from url and storing in the temporary file
download.file(url, tmp, mode = "wb")

#reading and storing data into a data frame
energy_data1 <- read_excel(tmp,skip = 12, col_names=FALSE) 

#Now reading only the column names from row 11
read_col_names <- read_excel(tmp,skip = 10,n_max = 1, col_names=FALSE) 

#Assigning the column names to the data set
colnames(energy_data1) <- read_col_names


```
